actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to clarify authorities of the Secretary of Agriculture is considering and issuing certain special use permits on National Forest System lands.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to permit specified tracts of land on or near National Forest ski areas to be used for construction of employee housing.

titles.title: A bill to clarify authorities of the Secretary of Agriculture is considering and issuing certain special use permits on National Forest System lands.
